attributes.action: reclaim a further £64,000 paid by Derek Conway to his two sons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent reports have highlighted the corruption that appears to be endemic within British politics. MPs have ordered MP Derek Conway to return £13,161, however the money paid to his two sons totals £77,163. We therefore demand, as the taxpaying British public, that the rest of our money is returned or that Mr. Conway face prosecution like any other citizen.
